strategy: Space Marine armies have a Strategy Rating of 5.
Initiative: Tarantula and Hyperios Emplacement formations have an Initiative Rating of 2+. All other formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+.
armyRules: The They Shall Know No Fear special rule applies to all Imperial Fists detachments.

formations.name: Devastators
extraUnits: Add six Space Marine Rapiers, four Space Marine Thudd Guns, or four Space Marine Thunderfires: 150 points

formations.name: Land Raiders
extraUnits: Add one Land Raider Achilles: 125 points

sections.name: Imperial Fists Support Detachments
sections.description: Up to three Support Detachments for each Core Detachment.

formations.name: Predators
formations.units: Four Predator Annihilators and/or Predator Destructors

formations.name: Land Speeders
formations.units: Any five of the following units: Land Speeder, Land Speeder Tornado

formations.name: Centurions
formations.units: Four Assault Centurions, or four Devastator Centurions

formations.name: Support Battery
formations.units: Six Space Marine Rapiers, four Space Marine Thudd Guns, or four Space Marine Thunderfires

formations.name: 0-1 Heavy Siege Relics
extraUnits: Add one Typhon Heavy Siege Tank: 125 points

sections.name: Imperial Fists Static Defenses, Navy & Titan Legion Allies
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations. Up to one Tarantula Emplacement or Hyperios Emplacement for each Support Battery or Scout detachment.

formations.name: Fortifications
formations.units: Two Bunkers, and 60cm Trenches and/or Minefields (exact proportions to be decided at the start of the game, before deploying objectives.)

formations.name: Hyperios Emplacement
formations.units: Three Hyperios Sentries, three Gun Emplacements

upgrades.title: Imperial Fists Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per detachment

items.name: Dreadnoughts
items.description: Add up to two Dreadnoughts, or two Hellfire Dreadnoughts

items.name: Commander
items.description: Add any one of the following characters to any unit in the formation.

items.name: Anti-Air
items.description: Add any one of the following units to the formation

items.name: Land Raider Transport
items.description: Add up to the number required to transport the formation.

options.description: Add any number of Land Raiders or Land Raider Crusaders
Add one Land Raider Achilles. May not be taken by Centurions or Terminator detachments. May not be combined with the 'Commander' upgrade.

items.name: Razorbacks
items.description: Add any number of Razorbacks, up to the number required to transport the formation

items.name: Snipers
items.description: Give all Scouts in the formation 'Sniper' on their Heavy Bolters

items.name: Typhoons
items.description: Replace up to five Land Speeders with an equal number of Land Speeder Typhoons
